sentences.en: " Ah has said time an'again , it doan do no good doin'nuthin'fer w'ite trash.
sentences.cn: "给那些下流白人做事没啥意思.

sentences.en: Accumulations of trash and silt should be near the primary element.
sentences.cn: 泥砂和废料的淤积要逐渐靠拢基本元件.

sentences.en: Aspiration removes lightweight trash by blowing it away.
sentences.cn: 轻的杂质由气吸装置经过吹风吹除.

sentences.en: He thinks most modern artis trash.
sentences.cn: 他认为现代艺术大都是糟粕.

sentences.en: I am sick at heart with all this trash. I will bear no more.
sentences.cn: 所有这些枯燥无聊的废话实在叫我讨厌, 我再也受不了啦.

sentences.en: I told him not to read that trash.
sentences.cn: 我叫他不要读那种蹩脚作品.

sentences.en: I wouldn't dignify this trash by calling it a novel.
sentences.cn: 这部劣等作品我是不会美称为小说的.

sentences.en: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.cn: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

sentences.en: Mammy -- Mammy says they're white trash. "
sentences.cn: 嬷嬷 ---- 嬷嬷说他们是些坏白人.

sentences.en: Rake up the trash on the ground.
sentences.cn: 把地上的废料耙在一起.

sentences.en: Screening separates much of the heavier trash by use of different - sized screens.
sentences.cn: 许多较重的杂质,经由各种不同的筛子筛除.

sentences.en: They'll be trash, because that's all she reads.
sentences.cn: 都是些无聊的东西, 因为她就看这类书.
你看的这个乌七八糟的节目是什么？

sentences.en: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
Would they trash the place when the party was over?
sentences.cn: 聚会结束时他们会把这地方搞得一团糟吗？

words.tran_cn: 没用的；碎屑的；垃圾似的；无价值的

trans.tran_cn: 垃圾，废物，断枝，碎块，废话，社会渣滓
trans.tran_en: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

trans.tran_cn: 废弃，拆毁，搞垮，贬低，从…上除去细枝或枝条
trans.tran_en: to destroy something completely, either deliberately or by using it too much
